snippet.title: LinkedIn, Apache Pig, and Open Source
snippet.description:
* rjurney
LinkedIn, Apache Pig, and Open Source rjurney July 1, 2010
Code Alert! This is a part of our continuing series on Engineering at LinkedIn. If this isn’t your cup of Java, check back tomorrow for regular LinkedIn programming. In the meanwhile, check out some of our latest product features, tips and tricks, or user stories. – Ed. One of the reasons I joined LinkedIn Analytics is its commitment to open source. At LinkedIn, we love open source. We’re committed to contributing to Hadoop and Pig and giving back to the open source community…
* Topics: * Engineering
